name: Cake Doodle
storyline: Crack the eggs, shake the salt, pour in the liquids, squeeze the lemon, mash the bananas, sift the flour, and toss in the dry ingredients. Blend the batter and bake your cake in our super fast oven. No need to wait for the cake to cool before icing and decorating it.
summary: Need a cake in a hurry for that special occasion? Love to decorate cakes, but hate the dirty pans, messy counters and hot kitchen? Cake Doodle, a baking simulation mobile game, is the answer! Eat the cake yourself when you're done or save it to your photo album. Surprise your friends with a customized cake e-mailed to them on their special day.
